books.author: by David Fisher
books.description: Stories of the American Revolution; a companion volume to the Fox News series.
books.name: BILL O'REILLY'S LEGENDS AND LIES: THE PATRIOTS

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary, a major author of the Federalist Papers and an advocate of strong central government. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Jenny Lawson
books.description: A humorous treatment of the author’s experience of depression and anxiety disorder.
books.name: FURIOUSLY HAPPY

books.author: by Lin-Manuel Miranda and Jeremy McCarter
books.description: The libretto of the Grammy-, Tony- and Pulitzer Prize-winning musical, annotated by its creator, along with backstage photos, a production history and interviews with the cast.
books.name: HAMILTON: THE REVOLUTION

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Eric Clapton
books.description: The renowned rock guitarist looks back on his life and his music; first published in 2007.
books.name: CLAPTON

books.author: by Angela Duckworth
books.description: A psychologist argues that passion and perseverance are the keys to success.
books.name: GRIT

books.author: by Bobby Brown with Nick Chiles
books.description: The performer looks back at his career, his tumultuous marriage to Whitney Houston and his relationship with their daughter, Bobbi Kristina.
books.name: EVERY LITTLE STEP

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Clint Hill with Lisa McCubbin
books.description: A retired Secret Service agent discusses his experience with presidents from Eisenhower to Ford.
books.name: FIVE PRESIDENTS

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight.
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS

books.author: by Siddhartha Mukherjee
books.description: An overview of the history and science of genetics by the Pulitzer Prize-winning author of “The Emperor of All Maladies.”
books.name: THE GENE

books.author: by Nathaniel Philbrick
books.description: The relationship between George Washington and Benedict Arnold.
books.name: VALIANT AMBITION

books.author: by Phil Knight
books.description: A memoir by the founder of Nike.
books.name: SHOE DOG

books.author: by Mary Roach
books.description: The science that attempts to overcome the challenges soldiers face.
books.name: GRUNT
